definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
China Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (CAAPA)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 You2 yi4 ji1 You2 le4 yuan2 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国游艺机游乐园协会

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: The elephants paint pictures in Elephant Show at Nongnooch Tropical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 泰国芭达雅东芭乐园的大象表演画图。

sentences.english: It is called Bronner's CHRISTmas Wonderland in Frankenmuth, Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 它就是密歇根州法兰克幕斯城的布朗纳圣诞乐园。

sentences.english: By the hotel to the Hong Kong Disneyland is only a few minutes walk.
sentences.chinese: 由酒店到香港迪士尼乐园只是数分钟之步程。

sentences.english: He was headed for Tokyo Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 他是冲着东京迪斯尼乐园去的。

sentences.english: Huis Ten Boch is an amusement park near Nagasaki in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 豪斯登堡是位于日本长崎附近的游乐园。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you tell me the way to the Hangzhou paradise?
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，请问去杭州乐园怎么走？

sentences.english: I am pleased you liked the picture I took at the California Adventure Park.
sentences.chinese: 徐华兵我很高兴你喜欢的图片我在加州冒险乐园了。

sentences.english: Many people like to visit Disneyland when they take a trip to L. A.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都洛杉矶旅行时，喜欢去参观迪斯耐乐园。

sentences.english: Disney world is a wonderful theme park.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼世界是个极好的主题乐园。

sentences.english: Does blue Shantou Mercury Fangte paradise open the door several AM?
sentences.chinese: 汕头蓝水星方特乐园早上几点开门？

sentences.english: While Disney allowed all the outdoor elements of the celebration to be free to the public.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼乐园的所以外部庆典活动都想大众免费开放。

sentences.english: You can wear NO shirt to a water park.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以打赤膊去水上乐园。

sentences.english: I want to be on a tropical paradise being served pina coladas all day long.
sentences.chinese: 我要到一个热带乐园，整天喝冰镇果汁朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Those in the Garden will be attended by immortal youths with wide, lovely eyes.
sentences.chinese: 乐园里的这些人将由永远青春的大眼美人儿伺候。

definition: Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
sandpit (for children's play or for long jump etc)/sandbox
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
